CustomField.description: Measures the data quality score of a Business Account
CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( Chamber_Of_Commerce_Number__c ) = 0, 0,0.25) + IF( LEN( Organisation_Type__c ) = 0, 0,0.25) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Industry ,""), 0,0.20) + IF( LEN( Primary_Shipping_Address__c ) = 0, 0,0.20) + IF( LEN( Primary_Billing_Address__c ) = 0, 0,0.10)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measures the data quality score of a Business Account
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
